Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content: User management involves a lot of tasks, reaching from configuring default user preferences to setting up organizational units and assigning roles and groups to users. Not to forget about permission handling. How to manage users is - at least partly - covered in several topics.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Get an overview on the various facets of user management.

Link.LinkText: User management is mostly done via the administration view - get information on the view here.
